3afe26d55d1578d19d8ebdd3a038e129 (01:22): So before going deeper in the subject, i hope you guys could give me some little advises ><.
83a50120da83c97104735e43acf6a8d5 (01:32): i have an html 4.01 document set up to send messages over a server. when i use the html5 doctype the mesages are displayed as "undefined"
3afe26d55d1578d19d8ebdd3a038e129 (01:33): 83a50120da83c97104735e43acf6a8d5: html4 doctype is <html>
83a50120da83c97104735e43acf6a8d5 (01:34): 3afe26d55d1578d19d8ebdd3a038e129, so i cant just change doctype and expect it to be backward compatible?
3afe26d55d1578d19d8ebdd3a038e129 (01:36): 83a50120da83c97104735e43acf6a8d5: you just need to put <html> HTML5 STUFFS </html>
